item.title: Welcome ... to Questionable Ethics (Insomni'hack CTF 2023)
item.author: cryptax
item.description: Actually, you’re not that welcome… ;-) You’ll understand why. Update March 28, 2023. Solutions to protect your computer. Description of the challenge “Welcome to Insomnihack! No bruteforce is needed! Simply run the following command on the attached file, and wait for the flag (it should take up to 1 minute). docker-compose up Have fun!" The challenge also provided a docker-compose.yml file. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 version: "3.
